CustomField.inlineHelpText: What are the most common credit profiles of your customers? (Check all that apply)
CustomField.label: Credit Profiles of Customers

value.fullName: Customers with a public credit rating from Moody’s
value.label: Customers with a public credit rating from Moody’s

value.fullName: Customers with audited financial statements made available to you
value.label: Customers with audited financial statements made available to you

value.fullName: Customers with unknown credit but strong business profiles
value.label: Customers with unknown credit but strong business profiles

value.fullName: Customers with unknown credit and less certain business profiles
value.label: Customers with unknown credit and less certain business profiles
